title: Tinderfy
desc: Full-stack web app displaying a userâ€™s Spotify analytics in a dating app profile
Integrated Spotify and LastFM API to display and compare user stats like top songs, shared artists and genres, and uniqueness, and shared content
Implemented recommendations and compatibility scoring to match users based on their music taste

title: Impost-AR
desc: Senior Capstone: Multiplayer augmented reality escape room and scavenger hunt based on the novel 'And Then There Were None'
Players solve virtual and physical puzzles to uncover clues and figure out which player is the imposter
Implemented networking with Photon Engine for seamless multiplayer interaction
Designed and implemented a variety of mixed-reality mini-games with Vuforia (image tracking, plane detection) and custom scripts and models

title: Portfolio
desc: This website! Designed and coded entirely from scratch

title: Audio Visualizer
desc: Moving 3D fractal that changes its appearance in reaction to the rhythm and pitch of a song of the user's choosing

title: Animal Farm
desc: Satirical 3D game where the user tries to manage a profitable farm, intended to educate them on unethical farming
